video:video.video:description: Airtable AI is designed to help you extract key insights from various types of content, whether it's summarizing meeting notes, feedback, or automating summaries for regular updates, Airtable's AI can streamline your workflow.
video:video.video:title: Airtable AI: Summarize and extract insights

video:video.video:description: Airtable AI includes powerful capabilities designed to streamline how you categorize, organize, and interpret data. From automating categorization of records, to integrating with third party services for enhanced workflows.
video:video.video:title: Airtable AI: Categorize information

video:video.video:description: Airtable AI is designed to enhance efficiency and clarity within your operations by intelligently linking records. Whether it's directing customer feedback to the right team or connecting project tasks with responsible individuals, every piece of information finds its rightful place.
video:video.video:title: Airtable AI: Route work in progress

video:video.video:description: Airtable AI can help redefine how you automate and personalize content creation with it's powerful generate content feature, which will elevate your projects and streamline your workflows.
video:video.video:title: Airtable AI: Generate drafts

video:video.video:description: Welcome to a world without language barriers brought to you by Airtable AI. This video will showcase the transformative translate feature of Airtable AI, designed to empower your projects with multilingual capabilities.
video:video.video:title: Airtable AI: Translate content

video:video.video:description: Welcome to a world without language barriers brought to you by Airtable AI. This video will showcase the transformative translate feature of Airtable AI, designed to empower your projects with multilingual capabilities.
video:video.video:title: Airtable AI: Translate content

Whether it's directing customer feedback to the right team or connecting project tasks with responsible individuals, every piece of information finds its rightful place.

video:video.video:description: This video explains user groups in Airtable, which are used to add entire teams to workspaces, bases, interfaces, or user fields with consistent permission settings.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Managing User Groups

video:video.video:description: In this video, we'll go over both why Airtable customers would want to verify your domain and the process to follow in order to verify your domain.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Domain Verification

video:video.video:description: The purpose of this video is to provide you with the visual guide for setting up SSO with Okta and Airtable.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Okta SSO

video:video.video:description: The purpose of this video is to provide you with a visual guide for connecting Entra ID formerly known as Azure AD with Airtable.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Entra ID SSO

video:video.video:description: The purpose of this video is to provide you with the visual guide for setting up SCIM user management with Entra ID.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on SCIM Configuration with Entra ID

video:video.video:description: The purpose of this video is to provide you with the visual guide for setting up SCIM user management with Okta.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on SCIM Configuration with Okta

video:video.video:description: This video covers sharing workspaces, bases, and interfaces; managing access and permissions; handling pending invitations; restricting invitations; workspace restrictions; company-wide interface sharing; viewing and adjusting user access, inherited permissions and manual removal and additional user management functionalities.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Sharing and Permissions Management

video:video.video:description: This video covers the account types that users can have in the admin panel.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Account Types

video:video.video:description: This video covers how admins can access the admin panel and what capabilities are available for managing users, groups, workspaces, and global settings.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on the Admin Panel

video:video.video:description: This video explains the difference between share invites and share links. It covers how they work and what to be aware of when using share links.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Share Links

video:video.video:description: This video covers Airtable's Permission Levels and Inheritance, detailing roles like Owner, Creator, Editor, Commenter, and Read Only. It explores how these roles shape user access and interactions across workspaces, bases, and interfaces.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Permissions

video:video.video:description: This video explains the Airtable concept of Organizations and how it relates to user management and approval methods.
video:video.video:title: Admin Overview on Organizations

video:video.video:description: Supercharge your company’s operations with Airtable AI. Watch this demo to learn how to embed AI across your most critical workflows. Use Airtable AI to uncover hidden insights, spark fresh ideas, and find new ways to strengthen and accelerate impact across the org.
video:video.video:title: Unlock your unknown with Airtable AI

video:video.video:description: Leading retailers are using Airtable to power their store operations, as they create in-store experiences that differentiate their brands and delight consumers. Store Ops is one of the many critical business processes that Airtable powers in retail, along with Merchandising, Marketing & Creative execution, eCommerce development, and staffing.
video:video.video:title: Retail Store Operations on Airtable

video:video.video:description: Save and print PDFs, update two-way syncs with an automation, and more to enhance your workflows.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - September 2023

video:video.video:description: Vimeo’s customer experience team needed to find a way to cut costs and deliver on ROI. Airtable helped the team reduce tool sprawl and create custom apps that grow alongside the organization.
video:video.video:title: How Vimeo consolidated tools and created fully custom apps

video:video.video:description: Supporting group work in Airtable is all about focus and clarity. This Interface Designer demo demonstrates how to implement granular permissions for interfaces, making collaboration in Airtable even easier. In this demo, we'll show you how you can transition your team's existing workflows to interfaces.
video:video.video:title: Demo: Streamline collaboration with Interface Designer

video:video.video:description: High-velocity marketing teams run everything from campaigns to content production workflows on Airtable. Our flexible platform means you can build exactly what your team needs to deliver ambitious outcomes.
video:video.video:title: Demo: Modern marketing teams run on Airtable

video:video.video:description: Siloed planning in marketing teams leads to increased stress, unclear priorities, and duplicative efforts. Without cross-functional input at the planning stage, launching campaigns becomes much more complicated and much less impactful. In this demo, you’ll learn best practices for campaign planning, including how to integrate cross-team plans and connect work at every level (goals, campaigns, activities).
video:video.video:title: Demo: Marketing campaign planning best practices

video:video.video:description: In this Airtable product demo, we walk through how teams are able to connect data and workflows with a single source of truth, visualize the same information in different ways, and automate work to free up time. Connect use cases like customer feedback, roadmap management, and goal tracking to achieve high-impact, customer-centric product delivery.
video:video.video:title: Demo: Accelerate product velocity with Airtable

video:video.video:description: From sending notifications to orchestrating cross-functional work, Airtable automations are a powerful rules engine that can help you and your team stay connected. In this demo, we'll go deep on three inspiring example automations, and give you the tools to build your own!
video:video.video:title: Demo: Automate your Work with Airtable

video:video.video:description: Explore powerful features, including granular permissions for interfaces, automation capabilities, support for high-velocity marketing teams, and solutions for overcoming siloed planning, all designed to streamline group work and boost productivity. Featured Demos: - Accelerate product velocity with Airtable - Automate your work with Airtable - Marketing campaign planning best practices - Modern marketing teams run on Airtable - Streamline collaboration with Interface Designer
video:video.video:title: Demo: Automate your work with Airtable

video:video.video:description: Code and Theory is a design agency that does creative brand work encompassing everything from renaming the Washington Redskins to the Commanders to creating CNN’s John King’s graphics on CNN. Airtable has fundamentally changed the way the organization works, given them a single source of truth, improving accuracy and efficiency.
video:video.video:title: Code and Theory saves more than 10,000 hours a year with Airtable

video:video.video:description: Get work done by sending actionable notifications via Slack, managing interfaces in mobile, and finding failed automations.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - August 2023

video:video.video:description: Getting started with Interface Designer is as simple as picking from the list of predesigned layouts.
video:video.video:title: Tool Tips: All About Interface Layouts

video:video.video:description: Check out our latest features and see how work can flow faster, while keeping everything and everyone connected.
video:video.video:title: The Airtable Connected Apps Platform

video:video.video:description: This month we're revamping the Airtable home screen so you can find your go-to apps in seconds. Plus, our new progress bar lets you see how close projects are to completion with just a glance.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - July 2023

video:video.video:description: With Airtable, drive the greatest impact for your customers and your business by connecting data and workflows across feedback management, planning, roadmap prioritization, and product delivery—all in one place. Aligning stakeholders around a shared vision, empowering agility during times of change, and ensuring teams deliver on their goals on time. Watch how today's leading product organizations utilize Airtable to deliver user-centric product experiences at scale, while accelerating velocity and reducing costs.
video:video.video:title: Airtable for Product Teams

video:video.video:description: With Airtable, you can multiply the impact of your Marketing department by connecting deliverables, campaigns, budgets, assets, people, and more — all in one place. So everyone — from execs to Content to Creative — all have the information they need to deliver creative excellence and high-impact campaigns. Watch how today’s high-velocity marketing teams run on Airtable in this quick explainer.
video:video.video:title: Airtable for Marketing Teams

video:video.video:description: This month, we have a big bundle of updates for you to get your hands on, from new features to manage your more complex workflows, to the ability to create new records in Interface Designer.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - July 2022

video:video.video:description: Track records across timelines, customize interface forms, and more in this month's product update roundup.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - June 2023

video:video.video:description: Turn records into templates you can use again and again, add fields directly to interfaces, and more this month.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - April 2023

video:video.video:description: Howie Liu, CEO at Airtable, invites leaders to imagine a fundamentally different way of operating. He envisions a world where companies can confidently create and deploy powerful apps across their entire organization. And where the power of AI is seamlessly integrated into day-to-day workflows. We’re facing a massive wave of fresh transformation, and the most urgent question facing organizations is: how will you adapt?
video:video.video:title: NY 2023: Airtable Leadership Forum

video:video.video:description: It’s a brand-new year, and we’re kicking it off with brand-new updates to help you manage Airtable with ease and edit your apps faster.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - February 2023

video:video.video:description: This month we’re welcoming kanban to interfaces, announcing the winners of the Interface Designer contest, and more.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - December 2022

video:video.video:description: There's a lot of cool and helpful stuff out this month!
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - May 2022

video:video.video:description: It’s even easier to build customized apps with updated Interface Designer capabilities, the brand-new List View, and more. Here's all that's new to Airtable this month.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - March 2023

video:video.video:description: Manage deliverables, streamline approvals, orchestrate team-wide campaigns, and report on outcomes with this template.
video:video.video:title: Template tour: Content operations

video:video.video:description: No matter which product or initiative you’re working on, Airtable can help you optimize your user research process. This video will show you how you can use Airtable to manage participants, plan interviews, organize feedback, and synthesize learnings, all in one place.
video:video.video:title: Build your UX research database with Airtable

video:video.video:description: 2022 was another year of uncertainty. Teams returned to the office, persistent inflation threatened the economic climate and disparate teams faced slowdowns due to siloed data. Instead of caving under pressure, the Airtable community built apps that continue to connect global teams. From Dropbox increasing blog traffic by 30% to West Elm creating efficiencies that save knowledge workers 85 hours a week. Here’s a look back at everything you brought to Airtable in 2022.
video:video.video:title: Thanks For Everything You Brought to Airtable in 2022

video:video.video:description: James Beard Foundation, a non-profit organization dedicated to enriching American food culture, uses Airtable for content planning and program management.
video:video.video:title: James Beard Foundation & Airtable: A smarter way to serve the food community

video:video.video:description: In this customer story featuring Baker Hughes, VP of Global Communications, Stephanie Hartgrove, describes how Airtable supported their Communications team through a series of company and industry-wide changes.
video:video.video:title: Baker Hughes: A transformation story

video:video.video:description: Korin, VP of Creative Operations needed a flexible tool that would help her team scale the brand, triple their inventory, and compete with brands like Pottery Barn. When she started all inventory was manually entered into Excel, and teams were using different tools like Basecamp or DropBox to upload photos and digital assets. Now they’re using Airtable to track every SKU, photo, and connect teams across 5 departments it's saving them 85 hours every week.
video:video.video:title: West Elm creates a sense of home with Airtable

video:video.video:description: Lindsey Puccio, a publishing manager was hired to help launch Equinox's digital fitness app, but the pandemic got in the way of their progress. While working from home, despite initial resistance to Airtable, she dove in. Before Airtable they were using Skylark and manually uploading classes and manually generating playlists. One class took 8 hours. Now they're bulk publishing hundreds of classes in a matter of minutes. Within a few short months she taught her whole team to use Airtable and improved Equinox's time to publish by 400%.
video:video.video:title: Equinox publishes content 400% faster with Airtable

video:video.video:description: The second edition of Airtable's unofficial user conference Daretable happened in Austin. We talked to some community members to understand what the Airtable community means to them. A special thank you to Kamille Parks, Kuovonne, Chris Dancy, and Alli Alosa for starring in this video!
video:video.video:title: The Airtable Community at Daretable

video:video.video:description: Matt is revolutionizing the way Taylor Guitars amplifies its messaging to the world. His comprehensive content calendar created unparalleled visibility into campaigns, budgeting, and increased publishing times. What Matt was able to create in Airtable worked so well it quickly spread to the rest of the company. Taylor Guitars now uses Airtable for manufacturing, apparel, accessories, budget forecasting, artist relationship management and much more. Taylor Guitars went from working in silos to a connected cross functional team. Their high level of sophistication in Airtable enabled them to create 343 automations giving them time back to work on much more meaningful nuanced tasks. It centralized their workflow, improved their time to publish and enabled teams to be more collaborative which has been essential during times of remote work.
video:video.video:title: Taylor Guitars brings more music into the world with Airtable

video:video.video:description: With Airtable's Interface Designer, you can build powerful, customized apps that streamline collaboration for you, your team, and even across your organization.
video:video.video:title: Collaborate with Interface Designer Preview

video:video.video:description: With Airtable automations, you can automate repetitive tasks, create streamlined workflows, and integrate easily with other key tools.
video:video.video:title: Explore Airtable Automations Preview

video:video.video:description: Reviews and approvals are key to many workflow. In this Tool Tip, we cover how to make reviews and approvals easy using views, automations and interfaces in Airtable.
video:video.video:title: Tool Tips: Make Reviews & Approvals Easy

video:video.video:description: This Tool Tips video dives into the ways you can keep stakeholders in the loop about changes to your data.
video:video.video:title: Tool Tips: Stay In The Loop

video:video.video:description: Make your base easy to use and navigate for collaborators. In this Tool Tip, we show you how to create a base guide and descriptions so users have the info they need. Then, we'll walk you through creating customized interfaces so collaborators can start working with your data.
video:video.video:title: Tool Tips: Prep Your Base for Collaborators

video:video.video:description: In this Tool Tip, we introduce computed fields and explore how teams can use them to get quick insight into their records.
video:video.video:title: Tool Tips: Computed Fields & How to Use Them

video:video.video:description: In our latest Tool Tips video, we dive deeper into computed fields and show how you can use them to perform concise calculations and create actionable buttons.
video:video.video:title: Tool Tips: How to Use Advanced Computed Fields

video:video.video:description: This week on the workflow hotline, we got a call from Robin, a product operations manager who wants to improve how they collect feedback. Learn more about Airtable for product operations: https://www.airtable.com/guides/product-operations
video:video.video:title: Workflow Hotline: Standardize, Centralize and Analyze Feedback

video:video.video:description: This week on the workflow hotline, we help Robin prioritize features based on her company's objectives, customer feedback and team effort.
video:video.video:title: Workflow Hotline: Align, Prioritize, and Share Your Roadmap

video:video.video:description: In this community spotlight we welcomed Caroline Vernick, Director of Product & Business operations at Frame.io to talk about how Frame runs product sprints in Airtable.
video:video.video:title: How Frame.io Runs Product Operations In Airtable

video:video.video:description: Keep track of your bill of materials, major deadlines, and get your team on the same page with this product launch template.
video:video.video:title: Template tour: Product launch tracker

video:video.video:description: Plan campaigns across different platforms and teams. And easily track performance with this marketing campaign tracking template.
video:video.video:title: Template tour: Marketing campaign tracker

video:video.video:description: Plan, execute, and deliver content for your team—and your company—with this template. Then, report on results in real time.
video:video.video:title: Template tour: Content calendar

video:video.video:description: Interface Designer is now available for all Airtable users, so you can drive work by taking the data in your base and turning it into dynamic experiences for team members.
video:video.video:title: Reimagine your workflows with Interface Designer

video:video.video:description: August 2022's product updates involve a lot of new options, from four new interface buttons to the ability to relabel records in your tables.
video:video.video:title: What's new (in Two): August 2022

video:video.video:description: Sun's out–and so are these product updates for June. This month, we're diving into document automator, more flexibility in sync, and more. Plus, a special announcement at the end!
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - June 2022

video:video.video:description: We’ve got a steady stream of updates in April 2022, including new ways to manage your team’s workload with resource allocation, upload attachments to the Airtable app, and run successful automations.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - April 2022

video:video.video:description: It’s your lucky month! We’ve got new ways to spot errors in automations and formulas, a new consultant directory, and more in March 2022's product update roundup.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - March 2022

video:video.video:description: This month we're focusing in on updates to interface designer. You can now add gallery elements to your interfaces, group items in a record review layout and new options for the chart element. Learn more about what's new: http://blog.airtable.com/interface-designer-product-updates-1
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - February 2022

video:video.video:description: Customers, community champions, and partners came together in San Francisco at the Airtable Leaders Forum to explore what’s next for our organizations in a world where every industry is reinventing itself through software.
video:video.video:title: SF 2022: Airtable Leadership Forum

video:video.video:description: Managing multiple marketing campaigns with different deadlines and external stakeholders can be a challenge, but Airtable is flexible enough to fit the unique scope of your projects, even as they evolve. In this 30 minute webinar, we'll walk you through how to address common pain-points with Airtable.
video:video.video:title: Airtable for your marketing calendar

video:video.video:description: This month we’re welcoming Kanban to interfaces, announcing the winners of the Interface Designer contest, and more.
video:video.video:title: What's New (in Two) - September 2022
